text: The Bushman's Bride is a 1912 Australian silent film. It is considered a lost film.Andrew Pike and Ross Cooper, Australian Film 1900–1977: A Guide to Feature Film Production, Melbourne: Oxford University Press, 1998, 35. It was likely based on a play. ==References== ==External links== *The Bushman's Bride at IMDb Category:Australian films Category:Australian black-and-white films Category:1911 films Category:Australian silent films Category:Lost Australian films
title: The Bushman's Bride
